title: AED Game Character Voice - The Necromancer
description: Harness the dark arts with The Necromancer, a master of the un-dead, wielding magical and corrupted forces that balefully twist the fabric of reality.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - The Necromancer voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.Â 


The Necromancer's voice profile is raspy, deadly and throaty with baleful energy. He is perfect for Necromancer, Evil Sorcerer in-game non-player characters or any villainous and evil game characters . His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in a clean and dry audio format in case you want to further process the vocals with effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Raspy, Male, Geriatric, Old, Withered

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Male voice-over audio files

115 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 309


Number of Audio Cues: 309


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
